Welcome to SoVisu+ Harvester’s documentation!

SoVisu+ Harvester is distributed under the terms of the CeCILL v2.1 license.

How to use this guide

For an overview of the SoVisu+ Harvester goals and features, see Overview section.

⚙️ To deploy the SoVisu+ Harvester, see Deployment section.

⚙️ To contribute to the code or develop a new harvester, see Development section.

📘 The main concepts underlying the SoVisu+ Harvester are entities (see Entities section), model (see Model section), and identifiers (see Identifiers section).

📘 For a general presentation of the Harvesters design, see Harvesters section. To find out details about harvesters that are already implemented, see their respective sections: HAL Harvester and IdRef Harvester.
